text: Need Mia White for Roll'd campaign. Budget around $2,182, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 3 x YouTube video, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Store opening, 2 x Facebook story. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 2 months. no worries
